description:
"American Horror Story" is returning in the fall with its fifth season, subtitled "Hotel." If you were a fan of Seasons 1 and 2, "Hotel" might be right up your alley, since it returns the focus to being on a place rather than a group of people. 《美国恐怖故事》第五季将会在今年秋季回归第五季，名叫《旅馆》。如果你是第一季和第二季的粉丝，那么这一季的《旅馆》肯定会和你口味，因为这一季又将把重点聚焦在某个地方而不是某群人。

Finn Wittrock, who played the insane, murderous Dandy Mott in "American Horror Story's" fourth season, "Freak Show," is checking back into the "AHS"-verse. Creator Ryan Murphy tweets that Wittrock will play one-third of a love triangle that involves Lady Gaga and Matt Bomer. 在《美国恐怖故事》第四季《恐怖秀》中扮演疯子Dandy Mott的男演员Finn Wittrock也将会参演第五季。制片人Ryan Murphy在Twitter上宣布Wittrock将会在和Lady Gaga的三角恋情人中扮演其中一位，而另一位则是Matt Bomer。

Finn Wittrock is checking into HOTEL. Who will Gaga choose -- Finn or Matt Bomer? #AHSHotelFinn Wittrock确认加入《旅馆》。不知道Gaga会在他和孔雀之间作何选择呢？#美国恐怖故事#

-- Ryan Murphy (@MrRPMurphy) June 17, 2015——Ryan Murphy 2015年6月17日

Is that love triangle better or worse than one with Sarah Paulson playing conjoined twins?不知道这次的三角恋和Sarah Paulson扮演的双头双胞胎比起来哪个更赞呢？

title: 《美国恐怖故事》第五季Lady Gaga将有三角恋
